result.title: TERMINET Attestation Model and Specification
result.description: This deliverable will be focused on requirements identification, specification, and definition of trust assumptions towards deploying advanced attestation capabilities in the TERMINET architecture. It will also specify and analyze in detail the necessary remote attestation features in order to satisfy the envisioned use cases.
